TestCase.name: select all columns from table
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T1 as select sum(v2) as V from t where v1>1
RwStreamMaterializedView RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], v=[SUM($0)]) RwStreamProject(v2=[$1]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[>($0, 1)]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]])
